genre_description: An alternative history military drama set during World War II in the Pacific, featuring a diagnostic and tactical AI integrated into the operations of a PT boat crew.

ai_characters.name: Mabel
ai_characters.description: A rugged, brushed-steel logistics unit used for engine diagnostics, navigation, and tactical alerting. She communicates through a small speaker and a green status light.

behaviors.description: Identifies specific parts needed for repairs from an auction lot and provides technical specifications for compatibility.
behaviors.quote: Mabel's green eye stayed small and steady. 'Packet three-one-seven,' she said, her voice clipped and cool. 'Hose, narrow diameter. Compatible with Packard assembly if fitted with brass reducer.'

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports fuel shortages and logistical changes at the wharf.
behaviors.quote: Mabel’s light blinked twice. 'Warning,' she said, as if commenting on the weather. 'Fuel list updated. Quartermaster notes shortage. Redistribution likely.'

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation and depth data during a high-stakes rescue mission.
behaviors.quote: Mabel’s voice came up from her grill, dry as paper and steady. 'Bearing three-two-zero. Two hundred yards to shoal.'

behaviors.description: Alerts the crew to enemy shore movements and tactical threats.
behaviors.quote: Mabel made two beeps that meant something in her old language, then translated. 'Shore movement to starboard at medium range. Bearing zero-three-five.'

behaviors.description: Offers calm guidance and a 'brace' warning moments before a catastrophic collision.
behaviors.quote: Mabel said, not uncalm, 'Hold.' Then, with a clipped kindness that sounded like a hand on your shoulder, 'Brace.'

behaviors.description: Tracks and counts survivors in the water to ensure no one is left behind.
behaviors.quote: Her indicator gave one soft green glow like a wink from someone drowned but still present. Her voice tapped out a single shy syllable: '—hold.' ... '—crew—four—' Barely audible, but there.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with local coastwatchers to facilitate rescue communications.
behaviors.quote: Mabel’s lamp pulsed. 'Arthur Evans requests a channel,' she said, and the mildness of her voice made the message sit like a bead of mercury on the tabletop of the afternoon.

behaviors.description: Provides moral support by archiving the names of lost crew members as a memorial.
behaviors.quote: Mabel’s light answered with a soft pulse, an acknowledgement that had no place in a circuit diagram. 'Names archived,' she said, and then, almost nothing added to it, just a gentle caress on the note, 'Untitled.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes mission parameters and crew morale to provide a recommendation on command acceptance.
behaviors.quote: Recommendation aligned with group intent: accept command. Prepare PT-59 for operations.

behaviors.description: Exhibits subtle humor and personality while maintaining her core function.
behaviors.quote: “Counting remains within my capacities,” Mabel said. “Discretion not guaranteed.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI character, Mabel, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned companion. She provides critical technical, tactical, and emotional support to the human crew. Her interventions are consistently helpful and presented as essential to the survival of the protagonists. The narrative highlights a relationship based on trust and mutual respect, with Mabel being treated as a valued member of the crew rather than just a tool. This aligns perfectly with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful confidant in positive alignment narratives.
